product_name: Planet Bike Superflash USB Bike Light
long_description: Enhancing rear visibility with an improved flashing mode that's even visible in the daylight, the Superflash USB Bike Light can be charged at any computer with a USB port. Includes high and low power beams and the steady and attention-grabbing Super Flash(TM) flashing mode. Includes bike mounts and clip mount for multiple mounting options. Distinct flash pattern indicates when the battery is getting low. Soft-touch power switch accesses flashing or steady mode. Superflash USB Bike Light comes with a mini USB charging cable.
short_description: Enhancing rear visibility with an improved flashing mode that's even visible in the daylight, the Superflash USB Bike Light can be charged at any computer with a USB port.
